title: The Death of M*A*S*H’s Col. Henry Blake
subtitle: Did the cast of 'M*A*S*H' not learn of the death of Col. Henry Blake until they were actually filming the scene in which it was announced?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The cast of M*A*S*H did not learn of Col. Blake's death until they were actually filming the scene in which it was announced.
